Posts.Content: Apr 24, 2008 10:08AM Connorzmom wrote: I am new here and have questions.  I had a excisional biopsy on Feb 29th...everything came back good.  A week later I was at my dr's office b/c I was bleeding alot from the incision.  Back to the surgeon and was told to wear a binder.  I did that, the bleeding stopped.  About a week later, I noticed that a part of the incision was open and oozing.  I had my ob/gyn look at it and she said she didnt see anything wrong.    Today I am going back to the surgeon...almost two months later...b/c it's oozing pus...it's painful and open.  I could probably stick a pencil in the opening.  It's not red on the outside...but hurts and I can feel a knot...the knot is sore. Wish I knew what they were going to do to me. thanks, Stacey
Posts.Title: excisional biopsy scar/indentation clueless1 Dukemom2
